title: [K-12] Competency-Based Language Acquisition e-Learning System Utilization Education

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital device usage skills and beginner-level language learning experience
context.additional_context: Language education course using competency-based e-learning systems in offline environments with provided digital devices, offering continuous feedback via formative assessments.

learning_goals: Learners can set and achieve at least two weekly language proficiency goals (e.g., business conversation, document writing) via an e-learning system
Learners complete at least 80% of self-directed learning tasks through personalized learning path design.
Learners demonstrate a 15% or greater improvement in language proficiency through peer assessment and collaborative activities.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
